timeline.content:
Hi jodie Arkless, üòä

I hope you're doing well! üåü

I'm Aashutush from the University College London Accommodation Portal. I've been trying to get in touch with you regarding the interest you showed in one of the properties, iQ The Arcade, London. üè°

Could you please let me know a good time for us to connect? Looking forward to hearing from you! ‚ú®

Thanks a lot! üòä

Best regards,
Ashutush

timeline.content:
Hello jodie Arkless, üòä

Any updates on when we can get your booking done? üóì

Since property availability is low and rents are also rising üìà, I am starting to feel a bit tense about this as well. üò¨

Please let me know when we can proceed. Thank you! üôè

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yes. Am I speaking with jody at least?
Speaker B: Yep.
Speaker A: Hi, jody. I should also from the ucl accommodation portal. I basically. Ucl university college london accommodation.
Speaker B: Oh, yes, perfect.
Speaker A: Yeah. So this call is regarding your inquiry about iq the arcade, london. So are you interested in the property?
Speaker B: What property? Sorry?
Speaker A: I.q. the arcade.
Speaker B: No.
